TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EmfType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定放置在加強型中繼檔 (EMF) 中的記錄性質。

span.span: Specifies the nature of the records that are placed in an Enhanced Metafile (EMF) file.

summary.span: 類別中的數個建構函式會使用此列舉型別。

span.span: This enumeration is used by several constructors in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks GDI + 會使用增強的 Windows 中繼檔影像格式 (EMF)。GDI+ uses the enhanced Windows metafile image format (EMF). EMF 格式包含內嵌資料的中繼檔中的註解機制。The EMF format contains a comment mechanism for embedding data within the metafile. 此註解機制用於內嵌 GDI + EMF 檔案內的記錄。This comment mechanism is used to embed GDI+ records within an EMF file. 包含 GDI + 資料的 EMF 檔案被稱為 EMF + 檔案。EMF files that contain GDI+ data are called EMF+ files. 無法辨識的註解資料的應用程式會略過的註解記錄，並呈現他們了解的記錄。Applications that do not recognize the comment data skip the comment records and render the records they do understand. 如果 EMF + 檔案播放時由 GDI + 中，然後 GDI + 記錄用來呈現中繼檔。否則，會使用 GDI 記錄 （如果有的話）。If the EMF+ file is played back by GDI+, then the GDI+ records are used to render the metafile; otherwise, the GDI records (if present) are used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EmfType EmfOnly = int32(3)

summary.span: 指定中繼檔中的所有記錄都是 EMF 記錄，這項記錄可以由 GDI 或 GDI+ 顯示。

span.span: Specifies that all the records in the metafile are EMF records, which can be displayed by GDI or GDI+.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EmfType EmfPlusDual = int32(5)

summary.span: 指定中繼檔中的所有 EMF+ 記錄和替代的 EMF 記錄相關聯。

span.span: Specifies that all EMF+ records in the metafile are associated with an alternate EMF record.

summary.span: 型別 的中繼檔可以由 GDI 或 GDI+ 顯示。

span.span: Metafiles of type can be displayed by GDI or by GDI+.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.EmfType EmfPlusOnly = int32(4)

summary.span: 指定中繼檔中的所有記錄都是 EMF+ 記錄，這項記錄只可以由 GDI+ 顯示，而不可以由 GDI 顯示。

span.span: Specifies that all the records in the metafile are EMF+ records, which can be displayed by GDI+ but not by GDI.
